alert.note: Alert for Western Greene; Western Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 20 at 11:39PM EST until January 21 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 15 below zero. * WHERE...In Massachusetts, the Berkshires. In New York, portions of the eastern Catskills, including Western Greene and Western Ulster Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The combination of cold temperatures and gusty winds will lead to dangerously cold wind chills tonight into early Sunday morning. The coldest wind chills will occur in the higher terrain areas.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
